website_summaries.verdict: This roller backpack has a lot of pocket space with two large compartments and a laptop storage area.
pros: Can hold a lot of books and a laptop safely
Holds up under a lot of wear
Available in several styles and colors
cons: Some problems with the telescoping arm

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a big upgrade from the last backpack I bought. It is big and holds a lot of books. The extended handle is smooth and hasn't gotten stuck. However, it can be a bit loud when rolling on concrete. Also, the top handle seems a bit flimsy especially when the backpack is full. Wish it was made of thick rubberized material. I'm always worried it will rip but with legendary warranty from JanSport, I'm not too concerned. Good overall backpack.
customer_reviews.author: kt_112

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my high school student who was having back pain due to carrying around about 30 lbs of books. He prefers this over his old backpack. Jansport has a lifetime warranty, too, which I have used before on other packs. You just pay for shipping and they will either fix the bag or send you a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M

customer_reviews.title: Good to buy for middle School students
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and bulk. I wish it had larger wheels but was lighter in weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: functional and compact
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use also. I have not yet used it on a long trip so when I do I will add to this review. The wheeled backpack suitcase is just what the description says!
customer_reviews.author: RTD1946

customer_reviews.title: Great value great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really durable rolling backpack. I highly recommend buying this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Davion & Astra

customer_reviews.title: Great Problem Solver!
customer_reviews.text: Solved the problem for a 12 year old boy with tons of homework, having to walk a distance...uphill!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin Material
customer_reviews.text: The material that makes the bag is very thin. The bag gets big and puffy when loaded with books. The straps are very useless in a case where the bag needs lifting and is very uncomfortable to wear. I do not recommend you buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Naj

customer_reviews.title: roomy and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: love this back pack and my son loves it too. it's very roomy and it's made very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Nursing Student Approved
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is heaven sent for this nursing student! Plenty of room for laptop, textbooks (nursing textbooks are huge) and notebooks! I can carry, or wheel if the bag is too heavy! Just be sure to tuck in the straps if you are wheeling so they don't get torn up! Top notch product and well worth the purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Anastasio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these Backpacks they are huge!!! Light and put up with a lot of beatings from my boys!
customer_reviews.author: Raisingarrows

product_meta.title: JanSport JS00TN8940L Driver 8 Backpack, Matrix Chevron Navy
product_meta.description: For a life on-the-move, the JanSport Driver 8 rolling backpack converts from backpack to roller with tuck-away shoulder straps. This wheeled laptop backpack features a padded 15 inch laptop sleeve, side water bottle pocket and front organizer pocket.
feature_bullets: THE DRIVER 8 BACKPACK: Wherever life takes you, from school to travel to work, your Driver 8 JanSport wheeled backpack goes too, keeping your laptop safe in a 15" padded sleeve, a water bottle at hand & your valuables organized in the front zipper pocket.

ROLLING JANSPORT BACKPACKS: Tuck away the shoulder straps and give your back a break with JanSport wheeled backpacks. All the features you love in original JanSport packs, with wheels and a retractable handle, for traveling across the continent or campus.

JANSPORT BACKPACKS: JanSport backpacks are made with durable fabric, zippers & straps, in colors & designs to reflect your style. We stand by our packs for a lifetime, so carry your JanSport on your adventures, knowing we'll replace or repair any breaks.

WE'RE ABOUT THE JOURNEY: JanSport is about the discovery of fun, freedom & adventure. From your first school backpack & lunch bag to the messenger bag for your first interview, from running errands to chasing dreams, JanSport gear inspires your journey.

WE'RE THE ORIGINAL: JanSport began making backpacks in 1967. From lunch bags to fanny packs to laptop bags, JanSport gear is durable and functional. You'll love our simple designs if you've used packs by Nike, Adidas, Herschel, Kippling, & Fjallraven.
